document_data.name: University of Flame Mages
document_data.mainbody: The '''University of Flame Mages''' was a school of [[magic]] located in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free City]] of [[Qadib]] in [[north Zakhara]].
document_data.Activities: The university specialized in educating [[flame mage]]s and teaching [[spell]]s associated with the [[element]] of [[fire]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Badiyah al-Sa'id al-Sahim]] ran the school in {{Yearlink|1367}}.{{AQ-time}}
